title: China’s London super-embassy almost certain to get go-ahead next week
description: Approval shortly before Keir Starmer’s trip to Beijing would come despite widespread concern among Labour MPs
content:
A vast new Chinese embassy complex in east London is almost certain to be formally approved next week despite renewed worries among Labour MPs about potential security risks and the effect on Hong Kong and Uighur exiles in the capital.

title: Two boys, 16, among three arrested as murder investigation launched after fatal stabbing in London
description: Police have detained two boys on suspicion of murder and possession of an offensive weapon after an incident on Monday in Feltham. A 19-year-old man has also been detained in connection with an alleged serious assault.
content:
Three teenagers, including two 16-year-old boys, have been arrested in connection with a murder investigation after a man was fatally stabbed in west London.
Officers were called to reports of a stabbing on Victoria Road in Feltham at around 5pm on M... [1597 chars]

title: HGV driver jailed for crash that killed two Ryanair pilots
description: Anthony Burns failed to notice traffic had stopped before smashing into the back of a stationary taxi.
content:
A lorry driver who crashed into the back of a stationary taxi killing two Ryanair pilots has been jailed.
Anthony Burns failed to notice that traffic had come to a standstill on the M62 in Cheshire until one second before impact at 05:31 BST, on 11 J... [3559 chars]

title: Hundreds of gunshot eye injuries found in one Iranian hospital amid brutal crackdown on protests
description: Doctors in Tehran have described overwhelmed medical staff as thousands of demonstrators have been killed by security forces
content: An ophthalmologist in Tehran has documented more than 400 eye injuries from gunshots in a single hospital, as overwhelmed medical staff struggle to cope with the toll of an increasingly violent crackdown on nationwide protests by Iranian authorities.... [6229 chars]
